snippet: Jack Eichel, the Sabres’ 18-year-old rookie center, scored a power-play goal to bring a 3-1 victory over the Senators, after his teammate’s goal was disallowed.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Ottawa Senators defeat Buffalo Sabres, 3-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jack Eichel, the Sabres’ 18-year-old rookie center, scored a power-play goal to bring a 3-1 victory over the Senators, after his teammate’s goal was disallowed.

headline.print_headline: New Star Rallies Sabres; New Rule Dooms Them
headline.main: New Star Rallies Sabres; New Rule Dooms Them
